title: Natural Language Search Success
description: Verify that the LLM (Google Gemini)-based natural language search correctly parses valid user queries and returns accurate real location data matching the query.

steps.description: Navigate to the search input
Input a clear natural language query such as 'cafes near Gangnam with outdoor seating'
Submit the search query
Verify that search results are returned and all show relevant cafes near Gangnam with outdoor seating
Ensure no fabricated or nonexistent places appear in the results

title: Natural Language Search with Empty Query
description: Verify system behavior when the natural language search query is empty or blank.

steps.description: Navigate to the search input
Input an empty string or whitespace only
Submit the search query
Verify appropriate feedback is shown to user indicating no input was provided
Verify no search request is sent or no results are displayed

title: Hierarchical Region Filter Cascade
description: Verify that hierarchical filtering cascades correctly through Province, Region, and SubRegion selections without confusion.

steps.description: Open the filter section
Select a Province
Ensure that Region filter options update to show only those within the selected Province
Select a Region
Ensure SubRegion options update to show only those within the selected Region
Deselect Province
Verify that Region and SubRegion filters reset or display full lists

title: Category Filter Functionality with Exclusions
description: Verify filtering by CategoryMain and CategorySub functions properly, including ability to exclude specified categories.

steps.description: Open category filter controls
Select one or more CategoryMain categories
Verify results and map markers update to show only selected categories
Select one or more CategorySub categories
Verify results and markers update accordingly
Apply exclusions to certain categories
Verify excluded categories do not appear in results or map markers

title: Map Markers Render Correctly per Category
description: Verify that Kakao Map renders markers correctly per filtered category and markers synchronize on interaction with place previews and details.

steps.description: Apply a category filter (e.g., restaurants)
Verify markers on the map correspond only to places in that category
Click on a map marker
Verify place preview highlights and place detail panel or sidebar updates accordingly
Click on a place card in the list
Verify corresponding map marker is highlighted and place detail updates

title: Place Detail Display on Different Viewports
description: Verify place detail view adapts correctly: displaying as sidebar on desktop and as full page modal on mobile.

steps.description: On desktop width (>=768px), select a place card or map marker
Verify place details appear in a right sidebar without full page reload
Resize viewport or open app on mobile device (<768px)
Select a place card or map marker
Verify place details open in a full page modal view

title: Add New Place with Validation and Backend Sync
description: Verify that user can add a new place with valid data, that client-side validation works, and the place is synced correctly to Supabase backend.

steps.description: Open add new place modal
Fill in mandatory fields (name, location, category) correctly
Fill optional fields like features, tags, and event tags
Submit the new place
Verify client-side validation passes and no errors are shown
Verify place appears immediately in UI list and map markers
Verify new place is persisted in Supabase backend (API returns success)

title: Edit Existing Place and Data Consistency
description: Verify editing an existing place updates the UI and backend correctly and maintains data consistency including related reviews.

steps.description: Select an existing place and open the edit modal
Modify fields such as name, tags, or features
Submit the changes
Verify UI reflects updated place data immediately
Verify backend update API call succeeds
Verify associated reviews remain properly linked to the place

title: Community Review Submission with Feature Tagging
description: Verify that users can submit reviews for places including feature tags, and reviews display properly with sorting and filtering.

steps.description: Open add review modal for a selected place
Fill in review text and select feature tags
Submit the review
Verify the review appears in the community reviews list for that place
Apply sorting/filtering by feature tags
Verify reviews reorder/filter correctly according to selected feature tags

title: Review Handling When Place is Removed
description: Verify that reviews linked to a place are handled gracefully when the place is removed or deleted.

steps.description: Delete an existing place that has associated reviews
Verify place is removed from UI and backend
Verify associated reviews do not cause errors and are either removed or marked appropriately
Verify user feedback informs about place deletion where reviews may be inaccessible

title: Image Upload with Compression and UI Feedback
description: Verify image upload process compresses images to under 2MB, uploads to Cloudinary, and provides user feedback about upload status.

steps.description: Open image upload dialog in place add/edit modal
Select an image file larger than 2MB
Verify image is compressed below 2MB before upload
Confirm and start upload
Verify UI shows upload progress or spinner
Verify successful upload feedback and image preview appears

title: Image Upload Failure Handling
description: Verify the system handles Cloudinary upload failures gracefully, providing user guidance and retry options.

steps.description: Start image upload with simulated network or server failure
Verify UI notifies user of upload failure
Verify user has option to retry upload or cancel

title: Responsive Layout Breakpoint Switching
description: Verify UI layout switches cleanly between desktop and mobile views at 768px viewport width, maintaining usability and appearance.

steps.description: Render application at viewport widths above 768px
Verify desktop layout elements are present (sidebar, map, lists)
Resize viewport below 768px
Verify UI switches to mobile layout with bottom sheets and full page place detail modals

title: Mobile Gesture Bottom Sheet Behavior
description: Verify bottom sheet gesture functionality on mobile, including smooth opening, closing, and scrolling without conflicts.

steps.description: Open bottom sheet on mobile via gesture or button
Perform drag gestures to close and open bottom sheet
Verify bottom sheet responds fluidly and locks/unlocks scroll appropriately

title: Event Tag Filtering Activates Correctly
description: Verify filtering by event tags activates/deactivates correctly and relevant event banners display for special places.

steps.description: Select one or more active event tags in the filter section
Verify filtered results contain only places with selected event tags
Verify event banners appear on relevant places in list and map
Deselect event tags or select inactive event tags
Verify event banners hide or deactivate accordingly

title: Place List Pagination Works Correctly
description: Verify location cards are paginated properly, with navigation controls updating the displayed page and syncing with map markers.

steps.description: Apply filters resulting in more than one page of results
Verify only one page of place cards is visible at a time
Use pagination controls to navigate to next and previous pages
Verify place cards and map markers update to show items in selected page

title: API Failure Graceful Handling and Retry
description: Verify that backend API failures (e.g., Supabase, search, image upload) are handled gracefully with user feedback and retry options.

steps.description: Simulate API failure on place fetch or search
Verify UI shows an informative error message
Verify retry button is visible and functional
Click retry
Verify API request retried and UI updates on success

title: Empty or Malformed Data Handling in UI
description: Verify the UI does not break and provides helpful feedback when receiving empty or malformed data from APIs.

steps.description: Simulate API returning empty place list or malformed place data
Verify UI shows appropriate messages such as 'No places found' or 'Data unavailable'
Verify no crashes or unhandled exceptions occur

title: Performance Check: Lazy Loading and Minimal Re-rendering
description: Verify performance optimizations like code splitting, lazy loading, and minimized component re-rendering are effective, ensuring smooth animations and interactions especially on mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate through main UI flows such as search, filter application, place detail view on mobile device
Measure and verify components load lazily when needed
Verify no unnecessary component re-rendering occurs by performance profiling tools
Verify UI interactions and animations run without lag or jank

title: Search and Click Event Logging Accuracy
description: Verify that search queries and place click events are logged accurately with detailed structured data and maintain referential integrity between entities.

steps.description: Perform a natural language search or filter search
Verify search query is logged with correct query text and filter parameters
Click on a place card or map marker to view details
Verify click event log includes the place ID, timestamp, and user/session info
Verify referential integrity between search logs and click events is maintained
